item.description:
Dallas Crane, supporting You Am I, supporting the Bon Savants. You Am I are one of the best live bands in Oz, and Dallas Crane (also Aussies) are on the move. This should be fun.
Depending on interest we can arrange to grab a drink and some food before the gig.
Tickets are available from the Middle East box office, open 1pm to 7pm, seven days a week or from www.ticketmaster.com. Cost between $12 - $17 depending on whether you pick them up yourself or not. Show starts at 8pm.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: You Am I and Dallas Crane
